item.description:
HAPPY NEW YEAR, Everyone!  We invite you to begin this new year by exploring a new experience.  Join Ramesha and Badri, the "Gurubhakti Brothers" in an evening of devotional chanting.

This is a guided practice of using chanting to go into progressively deeper states of meditation...leading to Pure JOY! 

The Gurubhakti Bros have been performing throughout the west coast in California and Oregon at various temples and spiritual communities, like the Temple of Joy in Encinitas, CA, Ananda Ashram in Los Angeles, CA, Ananda Village in Nevada City, CA, and at the Ananda Temple in Beaverton, OR.  They also performed at a special kirtan in Assisi, Italy.

They are currently touring the east coast, and we are so fortunate that they will  be with us for this Meetup...sharing their love of music and chanting, their joy of being on the east coast, and doing what they love to do most!

This evening is for everyone...bring a friend...no previous experience with chanting or meditation is needed.

Afterwards we'll have a vegetarian potluck dinner.  Bring something to share if you wish...or just come.

Donations appreciated
item.how_to_find_us: Directions are on our website www.AnandaRhodeIsland.org
item.name: KIRTAN with the GURUBHAKTI BROTHERS
